Name: Gathering
Desc:
Orders all Ether Swords to return to you. All Ether Swords return to the location where the skill was used in a straight line, attacking all enemies along the way and briefly staying at that location. Can only be used when there is an Ether Sword tracking an enemy with Order.
While Gathering, the Ether Sword's duration is not reduced. Gathering doesn't affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status and isn't affected by Cooldown Reset effects.
Required Skill: Order Lv. 5 or above
Lv. 20 Effect: Can learn the 5th Job Skill, Storm

H.Old:
MP Cost: 50. Attacks up to 10 enemies at 260% damage 4 times.
Attacked enemies receive a debuff for 30 sec., allowing Adele to Ignore DEF 10+% against that enemy.
When attack hits, there is 40% chance to create an Ether Crystal.
Cooldown: 12 sec.
H.New:
MP Cost: 50. Attacks up to 10 enemies at 260% Damage 4 times.
Attacked enemies receive a debuff for 30 sec., allowing Adele to Ignore DEF +10% against them.
Successful attacks create a 40% chance of creating an Ether Crystal.
Cooldown: 12 sec.
